channel.title: 2 THINGS! Mainly... How do i change the exp amount for every hit? Read for next
channel.description:
Alright i mainly need help on how to change the exp amount for every hit. I figured out the exp rate which is 120 for every 1 hit but i want it to be lower! Also for the second Question how do i make the 2213 bank open because i added a case and it still doesnt open can one of you people please give me the correct case?
Thank you all for trying to help! ;D ;D

item.title: 2 THINGS! Mainly... How do i change the exp amount for every hit? Read for next
item.dc:creator: @bill_dill_56 bill dill 56
item.description:
@bill_dill_56 wrote:

For The exp.
1-Open yore client.java.
2- hit,CTRL and F.
3-type in 120.
4-find xp rate and change to whatever.
5-compile.

Read full topic
